TextEdit Controller

class controllers.main_window.TextEditWindow[source]

Bases: PySide2.QtWidgets.QMainWindow, views.view_main_window.TextEdit

This class is where the functions will be carried out so that the actions of the interface work

Inputs:
QMainWindow

this is the type of page of our interface

TextEdit

inherited from views.view_main_window class

about()[source]

This function creates a message box with information about what you can do in the application

clipboard_data_changed()[source]

This function takes what is saved in the clipboard and puts it in what the paste action can do

closeEvent(e)[source]

This function checks if the generated text has been saved before closing the application

Inputs:
e

QCloseEvent

file_new()[source]

This function deletes everything that is in the editor if the previous one has been saved or discarded and thus be able to start a new one

file_open()[source]

This function opens the files that we have saved on our device to be able to edit them with the application

file_save()[source]

This function saves all the elements of the file generated or uploaded and modified in our application

file_save_as()[source]

This function saves all the elements of the file generated or loaded and modified in our application, being able to give it the format and name you want.

load_file(f)[source]

This function loads a file in our application, being able to load markdown and text type files.

Inputs:
f

the selected file

maybe_save()[source]

This function checks if the document has had a modification that has not been saved and gives you the option to do so

onTextChanged()[source]

This function does the preview of the markdown text every time it detects that the text changes

set_current_file_format(fileFormat)[source]

This function sets the format of the file (it is called in several functions)

Inputs:
fileFormat

the file format

set_current_file_name(fileName)[source]

This function sets the name of the file (it is called in several functions)

Inputs:
fileName

the file name

setup_edit_actions()[source]

This function gives the actions to the “Edit” menu of our interface

setup_file_actions()[source]

This function gives the actions to the “File” menu of our interface
